post.content:
This content is before the more tag.

Right after this sentence should be a “continue reading” button of some sort on list pages of themes that show full content. It won’t show on single pages or on themes showing excerpts.

And this content is after the more tag. (which should be the anchor link for when the button is clicked)
post.title: Template: More Tag

previous.excerpt: This post should display a featured image, if the theme supports it. Non-square images can provide some unique styling issues. This post tests a horizontal featured image.
previous.title: Template: Featured Image (Horizontal)

next.excerpt: This is a user-defined post excerpt. It should be displayed in place of the post content in archive-index pages. It can be longer than the automatically generated excerpts, and can have HTML tags.
next.title: Template: Excerpt (Defined)
